mapper.select: select * from t_student s LEFT JOIN t_student_idcard i on s.fk_id_card = i.pk_student_idcard_id LEFT JOIN t_class b ON s.fk_class_id = b.pk_class_id LEFT JOIN t_student_teacher st on s.pk_student_id = st.pk_student_id LEFT JOIN t_teacher t ON st.pk_teacher_id = t.pk_teacher_id where s.pk_student_id = #{param1} order by t.teacher_name asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_student (pk_student_id, student_name, age,gender, fk_class_id, create_time, last_modify_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{myClass.id}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifyTime} )
mapper.update: update t_student s set s.age = #{age} , s.student_name = #{name} , s.last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime}, s.fk_id_card = #{studentIdCard.id} , s.fk_class_id = #{myClass.id} where s.pk_student_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete s from t_student s where s.pk_student_id = #{param1}
